title: spencer’s paradoxes
descriptionMd:
*spencer’s paradoxes* is the name of my personal newsletter. I’ve written regularly on this blog since 2022. Some notable endeavors include a [100 mini-essay experiment](http://spencerchang.me/experiments/100posts) over the course of 2022 and a subsidiary newsletter for my regular research log, called *tiny internets*. 
My writing acts as a public journal recording my ongoing questions, struggles, and joys. I also document my creative process and share my thinking about leading a creative life.
